channel.title: go on Notepad
channel.description: Recent content in go on Notepad

item.title: [GO] Min/Max Value of Integer Types
item.description:
GO playground : https://go.dev/play/p/UoBkR10QmNc Official Reference : https://go.dev/ref/spec#Numeric_types package main import ( "fmt" "math" ) func main() { fmt.Printf("int : %d ~ %d
", math.MinInt, math.MaxInt) fmt.Printf("int8 : %d ~ %d
", math.MinInt8, math.MaxInt8) fmt.Printf("int16 : %d ~ %d
", math.MinInt16, math.MaxInt16) fmt.Printf("int32 : %d ~ %d
", math.MinInt32, math.MaxInt32) fmt.Printf("int64 : %d ~ %d
", math.MinInt64, math.MaxInt64) fmt.Printf("uint : 0 ~ %d
", uint64(math.MaxUint)) fmt.Printf("uint8 : 0 ~ %d
", math.MaxUint8) fmt.Printf("uint16 : 0 ~ %d
", math.
